articles.title: Scientists Decode How Mars May Have Lost Its Atmosphere - NDTV
articles.description: Solar winds may have led to Mars losing its atmosphere, according to a computer simulation study which confirms the long held belief that planets need a protective magnetic field to block such harmful radiations in order to sustain life.
